labels.value: Patient
What is the patient's name?
Parent
Grandparent
General Symptom Screening
Does the participant currently have any medical complaint?
What kind of symptoms does the client report. You can also select more than one symptom.
Specify the symptom:
The reported symptom is a danger sign. Please refer this client immediately to the health facility, organise transport and call the health facility and your supervisor.
Do you have a functioning blood pressure machine with you?

Finish and submit the form and then call you supervisor to inform him/her that you do not have a functioning blood pressure machine. Tell the participant that you will return and offer a measurement as soon as the blood pressure device is available again.
Explain the participant that you would like to measure his/her blood pressure. It will not hurt.
Does the participant agree to have his/her blood pressure measured now?

Tell the participant that it would be very important to measure the blood pressure. The procedure is not painful. If the participant changes his/her mind go back one question and correct it. Submit this form if he/ she still refuses the measurement.

Make sure the participant is seated, with the back supported and the arm rested on his/her lap or on a table. Place the cuff around the upper arm. Make sure the patient is sitting without moving and talking during the measurements.
Systolic BP  arm, first measurement:
Diastolic BP  arm, first measurement:

labels.value: Evaluation of measurement

The participant has a normal blood pressure. No further action is required. Congratulate the participant to the good value and tell him to keep adhering to a healthy life-style with a balanced diet, no smoking and regular physical activity. The blood pressure should be checked again in one year.

The participant has a highnormal blood pressure. Advice the participant to keep adhering to a healthy life-style with a balanced diet, no smoking and regular physical activity. The blood pressure should be checked again in one year.

bind.relevant: ( /bp_confirm/bp_confirm/evaluation/sys_average  < 140 and  /bp_confirm/bp_confirm/evaluation/sys_average  >= 130 and  /bp_confirm/bp_confirm/evaluation/dia_average  < 90) or ( /bp_confirm/bp_confirm/evaluation/dia_average  < 90 and  /bp_confirm/bp_confirm/evaluation/dia_average  >= 85 and  /bp_confirm/bp_confirm/evaluation/sys_average  < 140) and  /bp_confirm/bp_confirm/evaluation/sys_average  !='' and  /bp_confirm/bp_confirm/evaluation/dia_average  !=''

labels.value: The participant has arterial hypertension, because he/she has had two elevated blood pressure measurements. Treatment is recommended. Finish this form, submit it and then open the Hypertension Treatment Initiation Form in the task list

The participant has arterial hypertension, because he/she has had two elevated blood pressure measurements. Treatment is recommended. Finish this form, submit it and then refer the participant to the health facility for initiation of hypertension treatment

The participant has arterial hypertension, because he/she has had two elevated blood pressure measurements. Treatment is recommended. Finish this form, submit it and then refer the participant to the health facility for initiation of hypertension treatment.
